description:
image: Inline example image data to make it runnable on playground.

Use more compressed image to reduce source clutter.

Fixes issue 5983.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

adg, is this something worth doing?

https://codereview.appspot.com/12513044/diff/6001/src/pkg/image/decode_example_test.go

https://codereview.appspot.com/12513044/diff/6001/src/pkg/image/decode_example_test.go#newcode32
src/pkg/image/decode_example_test.go:32: reader := base64.NewDecoder(base64.StdEncoding, bytes.NewBufferString(video001))
bytes.NewBufferString should be strings.NewReader.

https://codereview.appspot.com/12513044/diff/6001/src/pkg/image/decode_example_test.go#newcode83
src/pkg/image/decode_example_test.go:83: video001 = `
